text: _________ is a set of rules for exchanging information over a network.
_________ is an implementation of a computer networking protocol suite or protocol family.
_______ is a network that connects computers and devices in a limited geographical area such as home, school, etc...
_______ is a computer network that covers a large geographic area such as a city, country or spans even intercontinental distances.
is a global system of interconnected governmental, academic, corporate, public and private computer networks.
